spots.name: Betaab Valley
spots.description: A scenic valley surrounded by snow-capped mountains, lush greenery, and crystal-clear rivers. Ideal for nature walks and photography.

spots.name: Naranag
spots.description: A tranquil village located in the foothills of the Himalayas, known for its serene environment and beautiful trekking trails.

spots.name: Shankaracharya Temple
spots.description: An ancient Hindu temple perched atop a hill, offering panoramic views of Srinagar and Dal Lake.

spots.name: Mughal Gardens
spots.description: Explore the stunning Mughal-era gardens such as Nishat Bagh, Shalimar Bagh, and Chashme Shahi, showcasing the grandeur of the Mughal dynasty.

spots.name: Aru Valley Trek
spots.description: A scenic trek offering views of snow-capped mountains, rivers, and alpine meadows, perfect for adventure seekers.

spots.name: Baisaran Valley
spots.description: Known as 'Mini Switzerland,' Baisaran Valley offers stunning views of Pahalgam and the surrounding peaks.

spots.name: Pahalgam Wildlife Sanctuary
spots.description: A sanctuary home to a wide variety of wildlife, including deer, leopards, and several species of birds.

spots.name: Lidder River
spots.description: A serene river flowing through Pahalgam, perfect for fishing, rafting, and nature walks.

spots.name: Gondola Ride
spots.description: Take a thrilling ride on the Gulmarg Gondola, one of the highest cable cars in the world, offering spectacular views of the snow-covered mountains.

spots.name: Snowboarding at Gulmarg
spots.description: Gulmarg is a popular destination for snowboarding and other winter sports, offering excellent slopes for all levels of adventurers.

spots.name: Skiing at Gulmarg
spots.description: Enjoy skiing in the snow-capped mountains of Gulmarg, a premier destination for winter sports enthusiasts, with slopes suitable for all skill levels.

spots.name: Alpather Lake
spots.description: A pristine high-altitude lake surrounded by snow-capped mountains, perfect for photography and nature walks.

spots.name: Outer Circle Walk
spots.description: A beautiful walk around the outskirts of Gulmarg, offering panoramic views of the valley and the surrounding mountains.

spots.name: Thajiwas Glacier
spots.description: A stunning glacier trek that takes you through alpine meadows and snow-capped peaks, offering breathtaking views.

spots.name: Sonamarg Meadows
spots.description: A scenic trek through lush meadows with views of snow-covered peaks, ideal for nature lovers and photographers.

spots.name: Sonamarg Valley
spots.description: Known for its stunning scenic beauty, Sonamarg is surrounded by glaciers, rivers, and towering snow-capped mountains.

spots.name: Vishansar Lake
spots.description: A serene alpine lake located at the base of towering peaks, perfect for nature walks and photography.
